constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACO Kingston Old Town Conservation Area
KEYACH Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change
CONARA Kingston Old Town Conservation Area

description: Remedial works to Portland stonework cladding and balcony to front of Guildhall
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The facing materials used in the development to which this permission relates shall match those of the existing building unless otherwise first agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policies HC1 and D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).
For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Erection of two storey side and first floor rear extension'.

Reasonable efforts have been made to check that the plans/documents submitted for the purposes of this application are consistent with the parent planning permission reference 20/02942/FUL, however, any inconsistencies would be resolved in favour of the parent permission. An Application for Approval of Details Reserved by Condition should not be used to evolve or modify the scheme in a way that is substantially different from that set out in the application.
